data.name: EARTH DEFENSE FORCE: WORLD BROTHERS - Ranger (EDF5), Sergeant Colors & Special Gear
data.detailed_description: The "Sergeant" is the reliable leader who allowed the protagonist of "Earth Defense Force 5" to reach his full potential. This allows you to play as an EDF5 Ranger that uses the Sergeant's colors. Furthermore, he comes equipped with a certain weapon that comes to mind when you think of the Sergeant. Now you can lead both your team and the planet to safety as if you were the Sergeant himself. Just be aware that the actual Sergeant character does not appear in the game.
data.about_the_game: The "Sergeant" is the reliable leader who allowed the protagonist of "Earth Defense Force 5" to reach his full potential. This allows you to play as an EDF5 Ranger that uses the Sergeant's colors. Furthermore, he comes equipped with a certain weapon that comes to mind when you think of the Sergeant. Now you can lead both your team and the planet to safety as if you were the Sergeant himself. Just be aware that the actual Sergeant character does not appear in the game.
data.short_description: The "Sergeant" is the reliable leader who allowed the protagonist of "Earth Defense Force 5" to reach his full potential. This allows you to play as an EDF5 Ranger that uses the Sergeant's colors.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*, Japanese*, Korean*
*languages with full audio support
